Fatma Zohra Ouhachi-Vesely (née Ksentini) bụ nwanyị Algeria bụ onye mbụ na-edekọ akụkọ pụrụ iche nke United Nations maka mkpofu site na 1995 ruo 2004
Tupu ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa ya, ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ pụrụ iche na Sub-Commission on Prevention of Discrimination and Protection of Minorities site na 1989 ruo 1994.
Ksentini bụ akụkụ nke Sub-Commission on Prevention of Discrimination and Protection of Minorities mgbe akpọrọ ya onye nta akụkọ pụrụ iche na ikike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi na 1989

Maka United Nations Commission on Human Rights, ọ malitere nyocha afọ anọ gbasara ikike mmadụ gburugburu ebe obibi na 1990. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị nyocha ya na 1994, o tinyere nchọpụta ya wee bịanye aka na Draft Declaration of Principles on Human Rights and the Environment.

N'afọ 1995, Ksentini ghọrọ onye na-akọ akụkọ pụrụ iche nke United Nations na ihe mkpofu na ya. N'oge mmalite nke ọrụ ya, ọ chịkọtara ozi gbasara mmetụta ahụike nke iwepụ ihe mkpofu na-egbu egbu. Mgbe o nyechara akụkọ ya na 1997, Ksentini katọrọ Ọfịs nke Kọmishọna Ukwu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka ikike mmadụ maka ịghara inye ya ego dị mkpa iji mee nyocha n"ala. Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na 1998, Ksentini malitere ịmepụta atụmatụ maka iwepụ ihe mkpofu na-egbu egbu na mba ndị na - na
Oge ikpeazụ ya dị ka Special Rapporteur malitere na 2001 wee gwụ na 2004.
Ewezuga ọrụ ya dị ka Special Rapporetur, Ksentini bụ onyeisi oche nke Working Group on Contemporary Forms of Slavery na 1991.
